description: Alterations to roof of existing single storey extension on north side to provide two rooflights and one extract duct to new kitchen, and a light base on top of the roof of the front porch over the existing single storey exit lobby; increased height of existing north boundary wall of the single storey side extension; and alterations to the rear (west) elevation to provide new toilets in single storey extension in place of the existing conservatory
decision_conditions: The development permitted shall be begun before the expiration of five years from the date of this permission.  REASON:	In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990. | All external materials to be used in the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing building.  REASON:	To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings. | Any machinery audible outside the premises must be designed to an acoustic standard not exceeding Noise Rating NR35 measured or calculated at the nearest horizontal or vertical boundary of the nearest affected dwelling, whichever is the closer.   REASON:  To protect the living conditions of neighbouring occupiers. | Details of extract ducting showing a means of acceptable discharge, the height of the exhaust stack and means of odour abatement shall be submitted to and approved in writing by the Local Planning Authority before any part of the development hereby approved commences.  REASON: To protect neighbouring residents living conditions.
